definition[0]: a performance by a musician or a group of musicians playing modern popular music or jazz, or a performance by a comedian
example[0]: The band are doing a gig in Sheffield on Nov 12.
definition[1]: a job, especially one that does not last for a long time
example[1]: That's a nice gig if you can get it!
definition[3]: to give a performance of modern popular music or jazz
example[2]: Working for a TV show is a pretty good gig.
